text: Karviná (; ) is a city in the Moravian-Silesian Region of the Czech Republic. It is the capital of the Karviná District. The city is on the Olza River and has about 51,000 inhabitants. == Twin towns – sister cities == Karviná is twinned with: * Jastrzębie-Zdrój, Poland * Jaworzno, Poland * Kaili, China * Rybnik, Poland * Wodzisław Śląski, Poland == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:Moravian- Silesian Region
title: Karviná
